dc:title:
New York: Catholic Worker Books, 1948 On Pilgrimage,
Foreword Dorothy Day 1948, p. 2. Introduces the book as "a woman's book, and for women," dealing "with things of concern to us all, the family, the home, how to live, and what to live and what we live by." DDLW #475 1948-01-02 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday/daytext.cfm?TextID=475
